review: WOW!! Everything about this product is awesome. From the moment it came, I was blown away.  The packaging was great; easy to open, all very uniform and organized in a very logical manner.  Out of the box, The set up was easy peasy too. The remote, I love the voice search , but I really like how Amazon even thought of the batteries.  A) it came with batteries and B) The battery compartment holds the batteries in place even without the battery compartment door on.  I have had to tape other remotes shut as the compartment door would pop off and the batteries go flying.  We have has it hooked up for about a week now, and use the Fire TV more than our gaming systems and cable combined.  The variety available of channels, games, apps, and movies is great.  There is no buffering issues, and we DO have buffering issues on our computers way too often! We have a Roku, but with us being Amazon Prime members, we felt we would get more with the Fire TV, and we were right.  I think some of our other subscription services may be cancelled soon! I would recommend this item for every family!
author: sherilynn then

review: I called customer service to lodge a complaint regarding the absence of information on the HDMI  cable required for using this product.  I have an HDMI, but it is used for my Direct TV service.  I would need to plug in and out of my TV in order to use the Amazon Fire TV.  My friend, who I encouraged to purchase this on sale, doesn't have an HDMI at all, so will need to purchase before use.I'm disappointed that this wasn't clear at the point of purchase.  Usually Amazon recommends these additional items.For example, I purchased a charger for my MP 3 player when I purchased a MP3 player for my daughter.  The charger doesn't even fit the MP3 player!!  Now I'm stuck with that unless I want to pay to return it!I'm a big fan of Amazon, but I do expect due diligence when you recommend or fail to recommend the appropriate technology.
